resources.string:
1. Normal download
 				Click the check version button to automatically obtain the version information of goldemperor

 1. Scan and download
 				Click the scan button to scan the QR code of the download link

 1. Manually enter the address to download
 				Enter the download address manually in the download address column

 2. Click the download installation package button to start downloading the latest version of apk

 3. Click open to install after downloading
